name: Chaos-Eyes Azure Dragon
text:
3 Dragon monsters including a "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
Once per turn, you can discard 1 LIGHT Dragon or Spellcaster monster: Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your GY into a zone this card points to. That monster gains 1000 ATK and if it attacks a Defense position monster, it inflicts piercing battle damage. During your Main Phase except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card and 1 LIGHT Dragon monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes" or "Azure-Eyes" monster from your Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Chaos-Eyes Azure Dragon" once per turn.
